title: Game Scoop Episode 617
description: Welcome back to Game Scoop!, IGN's weekly video game podcast. This week your Omega Cops -- Daemon Hatfield, Tina Amini, Sam Claiborn, and Justin Davis -- are discussing the 10 games PlayStation is giving away for free. They'll rundown some notable anniversaries happening this week like Animal Crossing, GTA Chinatown Stories, and Rainbow Six Vegas 2. And, of course, they play Video Game 20 Questions.
author: dan_parkhurst@ign.com (IGN)
